appName.message: Tuntunan kursor - animasi kanggo mouse sampeyan
appName.description: Judhul aplikasi, ditampilake ing toko web.

appDesc.message: Nambah efek lucu nalika sampeyan mindhah mouse sampeyan.Ekstensi iki nggawe mouse sampeyan obah nggawe efek sing nyenengake.
appDesc.description: Katrangan aplikasi, ditampilake ing toko web.

stopExtension.description: Yen diklik, extension dipateni nganti ngaktifake klik.

startExtension.description: Yen diklik, extension ngaktifake nganti mateni clirik.

ratingBtn.description: Tombol mbukak jendela anyar kanggo menehi rating extension kanggo pangguna.

askQuestion.message: Apa sampeyan wis seneng ekstensi kasebut?
askQuestion.description: Pesen tandha yen pangguna ngunjungi luwih saka 3 dina.

ratingQuestion.message: Thanks kanggo seneng!() Mangga rating extension!
ratingQuestion.description: Pesen tandha yen pangguna ngunjungi luwih saka 3 dina.
